DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate pharmacokinetics oral multiple-dose DWCZP tablet 100mg .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Pharmacokinetics Profile DWCZP Tablet 100mg Clozaril® Tablet 100mg
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , 2-way crossover , open , phase I study compare pharmacokinetics profile DWCZP tablet 100mg Clozaril® tablet 100mg multiple-dose oral administration schizophrenia patient .
DOC.criteria: Adult male female within range 20 60 . Diagnosed Schizophrenia ( Note : Diagnosed DSMIV , ICD10 standard Schizophrenia diagnostic tool ) . Administered clozapine 3 month sign agreement amount daily administer clozapine 100mg twice ( morning , even ) day , total 200mg study time . One might pregnant must get negative result pregnancy test ( urine blood βhCG ) randomization study time , one must agree appropriate contraception . However , one use hormonecontraceptive birth control 1 year Tubal ligation menopause exclude . One understood complete study explanation give , decide volunteer give write informed consent approve IRB participate study compliance requirement entire protocol . One record hypersensitive reaction Clozapine antipsychotic drug . WBC count le 4,000/ml Absolute Neutrophil count less 2,000/ml . Administering hypertension drug orthostatic hypotension . One clinical problem kidney liver include follow criterion : CCr < 50mL/min ; BUN > 30 mg/dl ; ALT 또는 AST > 3 x ULN ; Total bilirubin > 2 x ULN ; ALP > 2 x ULN . Diagnosed psychiatric neurological problem Schizophrenia ( e.g. , Organic mental disorder , severe tardive dyskinesia , idiopathic Parkinson 's disease , etc ) . Record Granulocytopenia Myeloproliferative disorder past . Record stomachrelated problem ( active Crohn 's disease , vital infectious intestine disease , ulcer , acute chronic pancreatitis etc ) surgery affect absorption study drug . However , simple appendectomy herniotomy exception . Chronic Hepatitis B carrier , proof Hepatitis C carrier Hepatitis C antibody . Immunodeficiency diseases HIV positive , AIDS , bone marrow transplantation blood ammonia . Record seizure 1 year signing informed consent form administer antiseizure drug ( e.g. , Epilepsy , Convulsions , Myasthenia gravis , etc ) . One constantly drink ( > 21Units/week , 1Unit = 10g pure alcohol ) stop drinking alcohol hospitalization period . Smoking past 3 month sign informed consent form stop smoking hospitalization period . One attend routine blood test . Bone marrow malfunction . Mental illness , durg addict coma . One kind circulation imperfection patient depressed central nervous system . Major kidney heart problem ( e.g . myocarditis ) . Incurable epilepsy . Paralytic intestinal obstruction . Generic problem Lactose intolerance , Galactose intolerance , Lapp lactose deficiency , GlucoseGalactose absorption deficiency , etc . Administered barbitalrelated drug drug metabolize enzyme inducer inhibitor 1 month start study . One drug affect result study past 10 day study start . One whole blood donation 2 month blood component donation transfusion 1 month signing informed consent form . Attended clinical test bioequivalence test 2 month sign informed consent form . Currently pregnant breastfeed possibility pregnancy one use medically approve contraception ( Note : condom , oral contraceptive , intrauterine device , abstinence etc ) . One clinically significant observation consider unsuitable base medical judgement investigator .
